DOC.brief_summary: In study test Diclofenac Nepafenac compare patient experience comfort follow administration ophthalmic drop .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Diclofenac vs. Nepafenac Ophthalmic Drops : Patient Comfort
DOC.detailed_description: In study compare ocular tolerability preservative-free Diclofenac Nepafenac drop . Using standard comparative scale measure discomfort , itching , burn pain interval 1 sec , 5 sec , 1 min 5 min post-administration . The result may aid doctor patient decision regard post surgical anti-inflammatory treatment .
DOC.criteria: patient face cataract surgery 18 cognitive decline
